metadata.description: Major 345kV and 138kV transmission lines in the Texas (ERCOT) Interconnection
metadata.coverage: ERCOT region - comprehensive transmission network including CREZ lines
metadata.notes: Phase B - Expanded with CREZ corridors, backbone 345kV triangle, coastal connections, and Panhandle wind integration. Capacity estimates based on voltage level and typical ERCOT line ratings.

summary.notes: Comprehensive transmission network including 345kV backbone triangle (DFW-Houston-San Antonio), CREZ corridors from West Texas and Panhandle, coastal generation connections, and renewable integration lines
